entities.name: the letters
entities.description: The letters are mentioned as being from 'no one 37', but their origin and content are not specified.

entities.name: nobody
entities.description: Nobody is referred to as the sender of the letters, but their identity is not revealed.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is a character in the story who is planning a trip with the narrator.

entities.name: the perfect place
entities.description: The perfect place refers to a location that Uncle Vernon has found, but its exact nature and location are not specified.

entities.name: everyone
entities.description: Everyone is referred to as being asked to leave the car, implying a group of people.

entities.name: the rock
entities.description: The rock is a location that Uncle Vernon points out to the narrator, and it appears to be some distance from the shore.

entities.name: the shack
entities.description: The shack is a small building perched on top of the rock, described as miserable.

entities.name: storm forecast
entities.description: A storm forecast is mentioned as being for that night, and Uncle Vernon seems pleased about it.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon found the perfect place, which is a location he has discovered.
Everyone was asked to leave the car by Uncle Vernon.
Uncle Vernon and the narrator visited the shack on top of the rock.
The storm forecast is related to Uncle Vernon's plans, as he seems pleased about it.
